means: （按剂量的）给药( dosage的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Very high dosages will cause netrotic lesions on both sides of the leaf.
sentence.Network_cn: 高剂量将使叶子两面坏死皱缩.

sentence.Network_en: The medical or pharmacological study of the dosages of medicines and drugs.

sentence.Network_en: It be a poisonous medicine meant for adults in small dosages.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为是毒药所以对大人来说算是小剂量但对小孩就不是.

entry.def: A dosage is the amount of a medicine or drug that someone takes or should take.

example.ex: He was put on a high dosage of vitamin C.
example.tran: 给他服了大剂量的维生素 C。

auth_sentence.content: These are precautionary dosages to prevent diseases.

auth_sentence.content: They can, however, survive antibiotics at higher dosages than are safe to administer in humans.
